name: TypeScript
description: A superset of JavaScript that adds static typing. It enhances code quality and maintainability.

name: Python
description: A versatile and powerful programming language. Great for web development, AI, and automation.

name: React
description: A JavaScript library for building interactive UIs. It makes frontend development efficient and scalable.

name: Next.js
description: A React framework for server-side and static site generation. Optimized for performance and SEO.

name: Material-UI
description: A React component library following Google's Material Design. It provides beautiful, responsive UI components.

name: AWS
description: A cloud computing platform offering scalable solutions. Great for hosting, databases, and AI services.

name: PostgreSQL
description: A powerful open-source relational database system. It ensures high performance and data integrity.

name: Prisma
description: A next-gen database ORM for Node.js and TypeScript. It simplifies database access and migrations.
